name: The Mythic Game Of Ur
description:
Press 'm' to mute music (doesn't mute sfx).

An ancient Sumerian board game from over 4,000 years ago, recreated for fun. Check out this video about it: https://scratch.mit.edu/discuss/youtube/WZskjLq040I/

Music by Kevin Macleod

For anyone interested in the odds of rolling a given number, it's the same as if you're rolling 4 binary lots, or flipping 4 coins.
